code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> AuthInitial

    state "AuthCubit States" as AuthFlow {
        AuthInitial --> AuthLoading: login()
        AuthLoading --> AuthSuccess: loginSuccess()
        AuthLoading --> AuthFailure: loginError()
        AuthSuccess --> AuthLoading: logout()
        AuthSuccess --> ProfileUpdating: updateProfile()
        ProfileUpdating --> AuthSuccess: updateSuccess()
        ProfileUpdating --> AuthFailure: updateError()
        AuthFailure --> AuthLoading: retry()
        AuthLoading --> [*]: dispose()
    }

    [*] --> CortesInitial

    state "CortesCubit States" as CortesFlow {
        CortesInitial --> CortesLoading: loadCortes()
        CortesLoading --> CortesLoaded: loadSuccess()
        CortesLoading --> CortesError: loadError()
        CortesLoaded --> CortesLoaded: selectSegmento()
        CortesLoaded --> CortesLoading: refreshCortes()
        CortesError --> CortesLoading: retry()
        CortesLoading --> [*]: dispose()
    }

    [*] --> QuizInitial

    state "QuizCubit States" as QuizFlow {
        QuizInitial --> QuizLoading: generateQuiz()
        QuizLoading --> QuizLoaded: quizGenerated()
        QuizLoading --> QuizError: generationError()
        QuizLoaded --> QuizLoaded: submitAnswer()
        QuizLoaded --> QuizFinished: completeQuiz()
        QuizError --> QuizLoading: retry()
        QuizFinished --> QuizInitial: reset()
        QuizLoading --> [*]: dispose()
    }
